truedefault1mde02a51801b1b5510074e639bbc4bcb2b8679ef89cb21120000f8d856634c9c4fsp_instanceadmin2022-11-18 09:28:426f7c03a41b9f1110074e639bbc4bcbda1At Cloud Dimensions your happiness as an employee is important to us13f5b0bb1b0b1510074e639bbc4bcbcb13f5b0bb1b0b1510074e639bbc4bcbcbsp_instance_6f7c03a41b9f1110074e639bbc4bcbdaadmin2022-11-18 09:31:25At Cloud Dimensions your happiness as an employee is important to usThe evidence is overwhelming - creating a culture of happiness leads to greater success for companies.  Employees that have purpose and feel a greater sense of engagement are greater assets to a company's future.  Happiness leads to greater productivity, less absenteeism, lower health care expenses and greater retention.  Understanding the connection between employee happiness and productivity will allow for greater operational performance.

", "displayValue": "

The evidence is overwhelming - creating a culture of happiness leads to greater success for companies.  Employees that have purpose and feel a greater sense of engagement are greater assets to a company's future.  Happiness leads to greater productivity, less absenteeism, lower health care expenses and greater retention.  Understanding the connection between employee happiness and productivity will allow for greater operational performance.

" } }]]>
